comment.author: Jacob
comment.text: Congratulations to a woman who has endured a 20+ year republican hatchet job. I trust Hillary! I will vote for the best candidate and that's Hillary!!!

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: John is a Democrat last time I checked...

replies.author: Baylee
replies.text: I just watched Trumps speech. I truly believe it is time to get (the net) and a nice starched shirt that ties in the back!!!! WTF???????!!!!!!?

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Watch the documentary about Hillary Clinton coming to theaters 07/22/16 YouTube the trailer "Hillary's America" #Hillary2016 #HillarysAmerica #DJT Get your tickets!
